text: Jan Martin Gerardus Notermans (29 July 1932 – 8 June 2017) was a Dutch football player and manager. He played for Fortuna '54 and Sittardia. He capped 25 times for Netherlands. He coached Arminia Bielefeld,http://www.fussballdaten.de/spieler/notermansjan/ Go Ahead Eagles, FC Groningen, AZ, Helmond Sporthttp://fra.worldfootball.net/spieler_profil/jan-notermans/#redirect and Willem II. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:AZ Alkmaar managers Category:Eredivisie players Category:People from Sittard Category:Dutch footballers Category:Netherlands international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Fortuna Sittard players Category:Dutch football managers Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:Go Ahead Eagles managers Category:FC Groningen managers Category:Helmond Sport managers Category:Willem II (football club) managers Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Dutch expatriate football managers
title: Jan Notermans
